targets.query:
// need this 'default' table to substitute possibly missing sys_errors table if errors were not registered by ECS service
import "csv"
default_sys_errors = csv.from(csv:"#datatype,string,long,string,long
#group,false,false,true,false
#default,_result,,,
,result,table,_field,_value
,,100,succeed_request_counter,0
,,101,system_errors,0
,,102,user_errors,0")

totals = from(bucket: "monitoring_main")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_transactions" and ("${all_hosts}" == "yes" or r.host =~ /^${host:pipe}$/ ))
|> range($range)
|> keep(columns:["_time", "_field", "_value", "host"])
|> difference(nonNegative: true)
|> drop(columns:["host"])
|> sum()
|> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)

sys_errors = from(bucket: "monitoring_main")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_error" and ("${all_hosts}" == "yes" or r.host =~ /^${host:pipe}$/ ))
|> range($range)
|> keep(columns:["_time", "_field", "_value", "host"])
|> difference(nonNegative: true)
|> drop(columns:["host"])
|> sum()
|> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)

union(tables: [default_sys_errors, totals, sys_errors])
|> pivot(rowKey:[], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
// map does not save non-group columns
|> map(fn:(r) => ({
a_succeed_request_counter: r.succeed_request_counter,
b_system_errors: r.system_errors,
c_user_errors: r.user_errors,
d_error_rate: float(v:r.system_errors+r.user_errors)/
float(v:r.system_errors+r.user_errors+r.succeed_request_counter
// this trick is needed because failed+succeed can be 0, avoid printing NaN in this case
+int(v:bool(v:(r.system_errors+r.user_errors+r.succeed_request_counter)==0)))}))

panels.description: Rate of successful requests and failures per second

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)

from(bucket: "monitoring_main") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_transactions" and r._field =~ /_request_counter$/ and ("${all_hosts}" == "yes" or r.host =~ /^${host:pipe}$/ ) )
  |> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt)  
  |> keep(columns:["_time", "_field", "_value", "host"])  
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
  // see MONITORING-194 for details about next 2 lines
  |> window(every:wl_dur)
  |> mean()
  |> drop(columns:["host"]) 
  |> sum() 
  |> group(columns:["_field"]) 
  |> rename(columns: {_start: "_time"})

panels.title: TPS (success/failure)

panels.description: Data access bandwidth of successful requests per second

panels.title: Failed Requests/s by error type (user/system)

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)


a = from(bucket: "monitoring_main") 
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_latency" and r._field =~ /.*/ and r.id == "ttfb_read" and ("${all_hosts}" == "yes" or r.host =~ /^${host:pipe}$/ ) )  
    |> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt)     
    |> drop(columns:["_measurement", "process", "tag"])
    |> difference(nonNegative: true) 
    |> group(columns: ["_field"]) 
    |> window(every:wl_dur)     
    |> sum()
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({_time:r._start, le_float: float(v:r._field), cnt_float: float(v:r._value)}))
    |> drop(columns:["_field", "_stop"]) 
    
p50 = a |> histogramQuantile(quantile:0.50, upperBoundColumn: "le_float", countColumn: "cnt_float")
|> rename(columns:{_start: "_time"})
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Read, time to first byte, p50")
p99 = a |> histogramQuantile(quantile:0.99, upperBoundColumn: "le_float", countColumn: "cnt_float")
|> rename(columns:{_start: "_time"})
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Read, time to first byte, p99")
union(tables: [p50, p99])|> group(columns:["_field"])

time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)

a = from(bucket: "monitoring_main") 
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_latency" and r._field =~ /.*/ and r.id == "ttlb_write" and ("${all_hosts}" == "yes" or r.host =~ /^${host:pipe}$/ ) )  
    |> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt)     
    |> drop(columns:["_measurement", "process", "tag"])
    |> difference(nonNegative: true) 
    |> group(columns: ["_field"]) 
    |> window(every:wl_dur)     
    |> sum()
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({_time:r._start, le_float: float(v:r._field), cnt_float: float(v:r._value)}))
    |> drop(columns:["_field", "_stop"]) 
    
p50 = a |> histogramQuantile(quantile:0.50, upperBoundColumn: "le_float", countColumn: "cnt_float")
|> rename(columns:{_start: "_time"})
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Write, time to last byte, p50")
p99 = a |> histogramQuantile(quantile:0.99, upperBoundColumn: "le_float", countColumn: "cnt_float")
|> rename(columns:{_start: "_time"})
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Write, time to last byte, p99")
union(tables: [p50, p99])|> group(columns:["_field"])

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)


from(bucket: "monitoring_main") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_transactions_method" and r._field == "succeed_request_counter" and ("${all_hosts}" == "yes" or r.host =~ /^${host:pipe}$/ ) )
|> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt) 
|> keep(columns:["_time", "_value", "host", "method"]) 
|> derivative(nonNegative: true)
// see MONITORING-194 for details about next 2 lines
|> window(every:wl_dur)
|> mean()
|> drop(columns:["host"]) 
|> sum() 
|> group(columns:["method"])
|> rename(columns: {_start: "_time"})

panels.description: Select multiple nodes and compare data access bandwidth of successful requests per second

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)

from(bucket: "monitoring_main") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_throughput" and r._field == "total_write_requests_size" and ("${all_hosts}" == "yes" or r.host =~ /^${host:pipe}$/ ) )
  |> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt)  
  |> keep(columns:["_time", "_field", "_value", "host"])  
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
  // see MONITORING-194 for details about next 2 lines
  |> window(every:wl_dur)
  |> mean()
  |> group(columns:["_field", "host"]) 
  |> rename(columns: {_start: "_time", host: "node"})

panels.title: Compare write bandwidth

panels.description: Select multiple nodes and compare latency of read requests

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)


a = from(bucket: "monitoring_main") 
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_latency" and r.id == "ttfb_read" and ("${all_hosts}" == "yes" or r.host =~ /^${host:pipe}$/ ) )  
    |> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt)     
    |> drop(columns:["_measurement", "process", "tag"])
    |> difference(nonNegative: true) 
    |> group(columns: ["_field", "host"]) 
    |> window(every:wl_dur)     
    |> sum()
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({_time:r._start, le_float: float(v:r._field), cnt_float: float(v:r._value)}))
    |> drop(columns:["_field", "_stop"]) 
    
p50 = a |> histogramQuantile(quantile:0.50, upperBoundColumn: "le_float", countColumn: "cnt_float")
|> rename(columns:{_start: "_time"})
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Read, time to first byte, p50")
p99 = a |> histogramQuantile(quantile:0.99, upperBoundColumn: "le_float", countColumn: "cnt_float")
|> rename(columns:{_start: "_time"})
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Read, time to first byte, p99")
union(tables: [p50, p99])|> group(columns:["_field", "host"])

panels.title: Compare read latency

panels.description: Select multiple nodes and compare latency of write requests

targets.query:
time_int = int(v:$__range_to_s) - int(v:$__range_from_s)
min_window = 300
max_windows = 200
sec_in_ns = 1000000000
window_len = time_int / max_windows / min_window * min_window
is_min_window = window_len < min_window
window_len = (int(v:(is_min_window)) * min_window) + (int(v:(not is_min_window)) * window_len)
wl_dur = duration(v:window_len * sec_in_ns)
start_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_from_s)/window_len) - 2) * window_len * sec_in_ns)
end_dt = time(v:((int(v:$__range_to_s)/window_len) + 1) * window_len * sec_in_ns)


a = from(bucket: "monitoring_main") 
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_latency" and r.id == "ttlb_write" and ("${all_hosts}" == "yes" or r.host =~ /^${host:pipe}$/ ) )  
    |> range(start: start_dt, stop: end_dt)     
    |> drop(columns:["_measurement", "process", "tag"])
    |> difference(nonNegative: true) 
    |> group(columns: ["_field", "host"]) 
    |> window(every:wl_dur)     
    |> sum()
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({_time:r._start, le_float: float(v:r._field), cnt_float: float(v:r._value)}))
    |> drop(columns:["_field", "_stop"]) 
    
p50 = a |> histogramQuantile(quantile:0.50, upperBoundColumn: "le_float", countColumn: "cnt_float")
|> rename(columns:{_start: "_time"})
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Write, time to last byte, p50")
p99 = a |> histogramQuantile(quantile:0.99, upperBoundColumn: "le_float", countColumn: "cnt_float")
|> rename(columns:{_start: "_time"})
|> set(key: "_field", value: "Write, time to last byte, p99")
union(tables: [p50, p99])|> group(columns:["_field", "host"])

panels.title: Compare write latency

list.definition: from(bucket:"monitoring_main")     |> range(start: -60m)     |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "statDataHead_performance_internal_transactions" )     |> group(columns:["host"])     |> distinct(column:"host")
